events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The support system has identified this case as a refund request due to wrong item delivery.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists for further assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
The order number is 4536271, and I have attached a photo showing the item I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide you with instructions on returning the incorrect item.
Thanks for your prompt help! I appreciate the quick refund process and will follow the return instructions.
Your refund has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We just wanted to check in to ensure your refund went smoothly and the return was completed without issues.
Since there has been no further response from your side, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting our support team.
